title: Export highlight clips for shot/goal candidates
scope: Given events.json candidates, export short highlight clips from the input video.
Keep clip extraction deterministic (time windows, encoding settings).
Record clip metadata and link it from the report.
acceptance: A CLI path exports clips for candidate shots/goals to the bundle.
Clip windows are deterministic and documented in diagnostics.
If video tooling is unavailable, failures are actionable.

deliverables.title: Highlight clip exporter
acceptance: Exporter writes clip mp4 files under the bundle and a metadata JSON.
Exporter is deterministic and bounded by timeouts.

subtasks.title: Implement deterministic clip extraction and metadata writing.
done_when: highlights/clips.py exists and exports mp4 clips deterministically.
Metadata includes event_id, time window, and output paths.
